title: Forager Cycles: New Blue Berry Fundraising Cable Cherries
content:
Remember those Forager Cycles Cable Cherries? These cable ends are reusable, made in the USA, and are a fun way to add color to your cable-actuated brake bikes. Well, this round of Cable Cherries is a collaborative effort between Forager and a local blueberry farm, Bow Hill, who suffered a massive loss recently. A fire started in the refrigerated zone of their production barn and burned nearly all the contents, including a ride-on harvesting machine parked outside. Forager is offering an option to donate at checkout on these new Cable Cherries in hopes to raise money to help out Blue Hill. If youâ€™re looking for a dab of blue on your bike, head to Forager Cycles!

The post Forager Cycles: New Blue Berry Fundraising Cable Cherries appeared first on The Radavist.
author: prolly
